product_name: Last Child in the Woods: Saving our Children from Nature-Deficit Disorder - 2nd Edition
long_description: This second edition of Richard Louv's Last Child in the Woods will change the way you think about your children's connection with the natural world. Author: Richard Louv. Softcover; 334 pages. Published by Algonquin Books of Chapel Hill; copyright 2008. Second edition includes a field guide with 100 practical actions we can take, updated research and 35 discussion points for classrooms and communities. Also includes a progress report by Richard Louv.
short_description: This second edition of Richard Louv's Last Child in the Woods will change the way you think about your children's connection with the natural world.
